cards.title: A lifelike Ailey
cards.desc: 通过Realtime Raytracing, Bloom hair等渲染技术，力求创造更为生动的Ailey。

cards.title: custom engine
cards.desc: 自研实时Custom Engine，生成无限的Ailey外形组合与行动模组。

cards.title: real-time MOVEMENTS
cards.desc: 运用Skeleton skinning system来生动地实现前所未有的实时肌肉动作。

cards.title: Deep-Learning
cards.desc: Ailey将凭借自主Deep-Learning变得更贴近人类。
